thread.title: Lenovo Vibe K5 Note announced at Rs 13,499; available exclusively on Flipkart | Zee News
thread.title_full: Lenovo Vibe K5 Note announced at Rs 13,499; available exclusively on Flipkart | Zee News

title: Lenovo Vibe K5 Note announced at Rs 13,499; available exclusively on Flipkart | Zee News
text:
Lenovo Vibe K5 Note announced at Rs 13,499; available exclusively on Flipkart By Zee Media Bureau | Last Updated: Monday, February 20, 2017 - 17:31 0 
New Delhi: Lenovo Mobile Business Group on Monday announced an upgraded Lenovo Vibe K5 Note smartphone in 4GB+64GB variant at Rs 13,499. 
The phone's 4GB RAM variant will now come with extra 32GB internal storage. 
Lenovo Yoga Book review: It hits the sweet spot between content creation and consumption 
The Vibe K5 upgraded version will be available exclusively on Flipkart from Tuesday midnight. 
With the upgraded storage the total storage capacity of the phone will be 64GB. Multimedia fans can now store over 15,000 songs and more than 70 hi-definition movies directly on the device. 
Lenovo Vibe K5 Note packs a 64-bit 8-Core 6755 processor clocked at 1.8GHz, up to 4GB RAM, 13MP rear camera, 8MP front camera and a high-capacity 3,500mAh battery. 
First Published: Monday, February 20, 2017 - 17:31 More from zeenews
